Headline: Green Line No trains between Harlem and Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem and Ashland/Lake due to track switching problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between 63rd Terminals and Ashland/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available between Harlem and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Board the Pink Line at Ashland/Lake for continuing service to the Loop.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
